Class Shape

  • java.lang.Object
    • Shape

  • public class Shape
extends java.lang.Object
    The basic class for operations on Triangle and Square classes.
    Version:
    18-August-2018
    Author:
    Saurav Pradhan, Aditya Ketkar, Mehul Kasliwal, Raghav Agrawal

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private int squareCount
      The count of Square objects present in the squareList array.
      private Square[] squareList
      An array containing objects of Square class.
      private int triangleCount
      The count of Triangle objects present in the triangleList array.
      private Triangle[] triangleList
      An array containing objects of Triangle class.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Shape​()
      The constructor for class Shape.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      char getColourOfMaxSquare​()
      The method traverses through the squareList array and finds the Square object with the maximum area and returns the colour of that Square object.
      Note: All the Square objects have distinct areas.
      char getColourOfMaxTriangle​()
      The method traverses through the triangleList array and finds the Triangle object with the maximum area and returns the colour of that Triangle object.
      Note: All the Triangle objects have distinct areas.
      int getSquareCount​()
      The method returns the number of Square objects present in the squareList array.
      int getTriangleCount​()
      The method returns the number of Triangle objects present in the triangleList array.
      boolean insertSquare​(Square square)
      The method is used to insert a Square object in the squareList array and also update the squareCount value.
      boolean insertTriangle​(Triangle triangle)
      The method is used to insert a Triangle object in the triangleList array and also update the triangleCount value.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • triangleList

        private Triangle[] triangleList
        An array containing objects of Triangle class.

      • squareList

        private Square[] squareList
        An array containing objects of Square class.

      • squareCount

        private int squareCount
        The count of Square objects present in the squareList array.

      • triangleCount

        private int triangleCount
        The count of Triangle objects present in the triangleList array.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Shape

        public Shape​()
        The constructor for class Shape. It does not take any parameter. It is used to initialize the triangleList and squareList arrays. The maximum size of both the arrays can be 10 each. It is used to initialize both squareCount and triangleCount to 0.

    • Method Detail

      • getSquareCount

        public int getSquareCount​()
        The method returns the number of Square objects present in the squareList array.
        Returns:
        returns an int value stored in the squareCount field.

      • getTriangleCount

        public int getTriangleCount​()
        The method returns the number of Triangle objects present in the triangleList array.
        Returns:
        returns an int value stored in the triangleCount field.

      • insertTriangle

        public boolean insertTriangle​(Triangle triangle)
        The method is used to insert a Triangle object in the triangleList array and also update the triangleCount value. if triangleCount is greater than or equal to 10, the Triangle object is not added to the array.
        Parameters:
        triangle - the Triangle object to be inserted into the triangleList array.
        Returns:
        returns true if the number of Triangle objects already present in the triangleList array is less than 10. Otherwise returns false.

      • insertSquare

        public boolean insertSquare​(Square square)
        The method is used to insert a Square object in the squareList array and also update the squareCount value. If squareCount is greater than or equal to 10, the Square object is not added to the array.
        Parameters:
        square - the Square object to be inserted into the squareList array.
        Returns:
        returns true if the number of Square objects already present in the squareList array is less than 10. Otherwise returns false.

      • getColourOfMaxSquare

        public char getColourOfMaxSquare​()
        The method traverses through the squareList array and finds the Square object with the maximum area and returns the colour of that Square object.
        Note: All the Square objects have distinct areas.
        Returns:
        returns colour of the maximum area square found in the squareList array. If the number of squares in the (@code squareList) array is 0 then return 'N'.

      • getColourOfMaxTriangle

        public char getColourOfMaxTriangle​()
        The method traverses through the triangleList array and finds the Triangle object with the maximum area and returns the colour of that Triangle object.
        Note: All the Triangle objects have distinct areas.
        Returns:
        returns colour of the maximum area triangle found in the triangleList array. If the number of triangles present in the triangleList array is 0 then return 'N'.
